org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge

Class VeluxBridgeActuators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridgeActuators

  • @NonNullByDefault
public class VeluxBridgeActuators
extends java.lang.Object
    The VeluxBridgeActuators represents a complete set of transactions for retrieving of any available products into a structure channel defined on the Velux bridge.

    It provides the methods:

    • getProducts(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge) for retrieval of information from the bridge.
    • getChannel() for accessing the retrieved information.
    • autoRefresh(org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.VeluxBridge) for retrieval of information for supporting the update the corresponding openHAB items.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution
    See Also:
    VeluxProduct, VeluxExistingProducts, VeluxBridgeProvider

      class  VeluxBridgeActuators.Channel
      Actuator information consisting of: isRetrieved (boolean), existingProducts (VeluxExistingProducts).

      private static int VELUXBINDING_SYSTEMTABLE_MAX
      Limitation of Discovery on parts of the System table Whereas the parameter VeluxKLFAPI.KLF_SYSTEMTABLE_MAX represents the maximum size of the system table in general, for speed up of the discovery process a binding-internal limitation of number of possible devices is introduced.

      • VELUXBINDING_SYSTEMTABLE_MAX

        private static final int VELUXBINDING_SYSTEMTABLE_MAX
        Limitation of Discovery on parts of the System table Whereas the parameter VeluxKLFAPI.KLF_SYSTEMTABLE_MAX represents the maximum size of the system table in general, for speed up of the discovery process a binding-internal limitation of number of possible devices is introduced.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VeluxBridgeActuators

        public VeluxBridgeActuators()
        Constructor.

        Initializes the internal data structure channel of Velux actuators/products, which is publicly accessible via the method getChannel().

    • Method Detail

      • getChannel

        public VeluxBridgeActuators.Channel getChannel()
        Provide access to the internal structure of actuators/products.
        Returns:
        a channel describing the overall actuator situation.

      • getProducts

        public boolean getProducts(VeluxBridge bridge)
        Login into bridge, retrieve all products and logout from bridge based on a well-prepared environment of a VeluxBridgeProvider. The results are stored within VeluxExistingProducts.
        Parameters:
        bridge - Initialized Velux bridge (communication) handler.
        Returns:
        true if successful, and false otherwise.

      • autoRefresh

        public boolean autoRefresh(VeluxBridge bridge)
        In case of an empty list of recognized products, the method will initiate a product retrieval using getProducts(VeluxBridge).
        Parameters:
        bridge - Initialized Velux bridge (communication) handler.
        Returns:
        true if at least one product was found, and false otherwise.
